children.name: lexicographic
keywords: Key idea: use a lexicographic ordering on actions to identify a representative for each trace → enumerate runs according to the lexicographic ordering

children.name: implementation
nopor: no POR, builds a graph with DFS ordering, states explored once
keywords: nopor: no POR, builds a graph with DFS ordering, states explored once

children.name: lex: runs enumerated according to lexicographic ordering
keywords: lex: runs enumerated according to lexicographic ordering

children.name: dyn1: race reversals detection computed by reexploring each run from the node, heuristics of actions to explore=prioritize the execution of actions that have a race → race reversals detection needed only for first child of each node
keywords: dyn1: race reversals detection computed by reexploring each run from the node, heuristics of actions to explore=prioritize the execution of actions that have a race → race reversals detection needed only for first child of each node

children.name: dyn2: race reversals detection computed by reexploring each run from the node as a graph (i.e. each transition explored once), heuristics of actions to explore= → race reversals detection needed only for first child of each node
keywords: dyn2: race reversals detection computed by reexploring each run from the node as a graph (i.e. each transition explored once), heuristics of actions to explore= → race reversals detection needed only for first child of each node
